item.title: Command&exp help

item.description:
@j_dog wrote:

Ok can someone giveme code for admins to do ::pickup commands?
EX ::pickup 4999 1

And i want exp faster but i donâ€™t get how to edit this

case 1531: if(GoodDistance2(absX, absY, objectX, objectY, 3)) { if(actionTimer == 0) { sendMessage("Stop hitting the F'in door"); actionTimer = 20; setAnimation(0x326); addSkillXP((60*playerLevel[2]), 2); addSkillXP((30*playerLevel[3]), 3); addSkillXP((15*playerLevel[18]), 18); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } } break;
